name: Hyperdimensional Processor
desc: A computational device capable of performing calculations that violate both the p = np and Raylah-Byong hyperspace computational interference principles. While it is believed that other such examples of the object are present, the inconsistent readings from sensors and reports of required interfaces has lead to much speculation that it is not of Domain make

name: Modular Constructor - Dormant
desc: A nanotech marvel, once pivotal in crafting the advanced infrastructure of the Domain of Man, designed for one-time use. It automates industrial upgrades, transforming raw materials into scalable solutions and irreversibly integrating into the infrastructure. This tool represents a transformative investment for enterprises aiming at rapid expansion and innovation, embodying a legacy of advanced construction and development.
